params.sqlcmd: "SELECT " +" VEND_NAME, " +" VEND_ANAME, " +" VEND_KNAME, " +" ZIP_CD, " +" ADDRESS_1, " +" ADDRESS_2, " +" ADDRESS_K_1, " +" ADDRESS_K_2, " +" TEL, " +" FAX, " +" EMAIL, " +" VEND_ORG, " +" VEND_PERSON, " +" OWN_ORG_CD, " +" OWN_ORG_NAME, " +" OWN_PERSON_CD, " +" OWN_PERSON_NAME, " +" ROUND_TYP, " +" TAX_CD, " +" TAX_APPLY_TYP, " +" TAX_CALC_TYP, " +" INSPC_ACPT_APP_TYP, " +" ODR_FORM_FLG, " +" ODR_EDI_FLG, " +" VEND_REM, " +" CUR_CD, " +" EXCH_TYP, " +" IMPORT_TRN_TYP, " +" UNIT_COST_RETROACTION_FLG " +"FROM " +" M_VEND_CTRL " +"WHERE " +" COMPANY_CD = ? " +" AND VEND_CD = ?"

"INSERT INTO " +" M_VEND_CTRL(COMPANY_CD, VEND_CD, VEND_NAME, VEND_ANAME, VEND_KNAME, ZIP_CD, ADDRESS_1, ADDRESS_2, ADDRESS_K_1, ADDRESS_K_2, TEL, FAX, EMAIL, VEND_ORG, VEND_PERSON, OWN_ORG_CD, OWN_ORG_NAME, OWN_PERSON_CD, OWN_PERSON_NAME, ROUND_TYP, TAX_CD, TAX_APPLY_TYP, TAX_CALC_TYP, INSPC_ACPT_APP_TYP, ODR_FORM_FLG, ODR_EDI_FLG, VEND_REM, CUR_CD, EXCH_TYP, IMPORT_TRN_TYP, UNIT_COST_RETROACTION_FLG) " +"VALUES " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?))"

"UPDATE " +" M_VEND_CTRL " +"SET " +" VEND_NAME = ?, " +" VEND_ANAME = ?, " +" VEND_KNAME = ?, " +" ZIP_CD = ?, " +" ADDRESS_1 = ?, " +" ADDRESS_2 = ?, " +" ADDRESS_K_1 = ?, " +" ADDRESS_K_2 = ?, " +" TEL = ?, " +" FAX = ?, " +" EMAIL = ?, " +" VEND_ORG = ?, " +" VEND_PERSON = ?, " +" OWN_ORG_CD = ?, " +" OWN_ORG_NAME = ?, " +" OWN_PERSON_CD = ?, " +" OWN_PERSON_NAME = ?, " +" ROUND_TYP = ?, " +" TAX_CD = ?, " +" TAX_APPLY_TYP = ?, " +" TAX_CALC_TYP = ?, " +" INSPC_ACPT_APP_TYP = ?, " +" ODR_FORM_FLG = ?, " +" ODR_EDI_FLG = ?, " +" VEND_REM = ?, " +" CUR_CD = ?, " +" EXCH_TYP = ?, " +" IMPORT_TRN_TYP = ?, " +" UNIT_COST_RETROACTION_FLG = ? " +"WHERE " +" COMPANY_CD = ? " +" AND VEND_CD = ?"
"DELETE FROM " +" M_VEND_CTRL " +"WHERE " +" COMPANY_CD = ? " +" AND VEND_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" HOME_CUR_CD " +"FROM " +" SYS_HOME_CUR " +"WHERE " +" CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM'"
"SELECT " +" VEND_CD " +"FROM " +" M_VEND_CTRL " +"WHERE " +" COMPANY_CD = ? " +" AND VEND_CD = ?"
"select " +" TAX_CD " +"from " +" M_TAX " +"where " +" TAX_CD = ?"
"select " +" CUR_CD " +"from " +" M_CUR " +"where " +" CUR_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" UM.USER_NAME " +"FROM " +" USER_MST UM, " +" M_PLANT MP " +"WHERE " +" UM.USER_CD = ? " +" AND UM.PLANT_CD = MP.PLANT_CD"
"select " +" M_PROC_GRP.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_PROC_GRP " +"where " +" M_PROC_GRP.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_PROC_GRP.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_WH.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_WH " +"where " +" M_WH.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_WH.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_PUCH_UNIT_COST_H.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_PUCH_UNIT_COST_H " +"where " +" M_PUCH_UNIT_COST_H.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_PUCH_UNIT_COST_H.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_SBCNT_UNIT_COST_H.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_SBCNT_UNIT_COST_H " +"where " +" M_SBCNT_UNIT_COST_H.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_SBCNT_UNIT_COST_H.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR " +"where " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"ONEROUS_CONS_NO\\" AS \\"ONEROUS_CONS_NO\\" " +"FROM " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS " +"WHERE " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" AS \\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" " +"FROM " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT " +"WHERE " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ?"
"SELECT " +" M.VEND_CD " +"FROM " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST M " +"WHERE " +" M.COMPANY_CD = ? " +" AND M.VEND_CD = ?"
"select " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" as \\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +"from " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM'"
"SELECT " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"INSTALL_FLG\\" AS \\"INSTALL_FLG\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS " +"WHERE " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"OPTION_ID\\" = ?"
"SELECT " +" VEND_CD " +"FROM " +" T_TRANSPORT_STOCK " +"WHERE " +" COMPANY_CD = ? " +" AND VEND_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" VEND_CD " +"FROM " +" T_ISSUE_INST " +"WHERE " +" COMPANY_CD = ? " +" AND VEND_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" PAYEE_CD " +"FROM " +" T_DEBT_BALANCE " +"WHERE " +" COMPANY_CD = ? " +" AND PAYEE_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" VEND_CD " +"FROM " +" T_DEBT_BALANCE_D " +"WHERE " +" COMPANY_CD = ? " +" AND(VEND_CD = ? " +" OR PAYEE_CD = ?)"
"SELECT " +" VEND_CD " +"FROM " +" T_DEBT_LEDGER_H " +"WHERE " +" COMPANY_CD = ? " +" AND(VEND_CD = ? " +" OR PAYEE_CD = ?)"
"SELECT " +" VEND_CD " +"FROM " +" T_DEBT_LEDGER_H_TRN " +"WHERE " +" COMPANY_CD = ? " +" AND(VEND_CD = ? " +" OR PAYEE_CD = ?)"
"SELECT " +" PAYEE_CD " +"FROM " +" T_PAYMENT " +"WHERE " +" COMPANY_CD = ? " +" AND PAYEE_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" VEND_CD " +"FROM " +" T_PAYMENT_CALC " +"WHERE " +" COMPANY_CD = ? " +" AND(VEND_CD = ? " +" OR PAYEE_CD = ?)"
